LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_Category_Desc: A general level of severity of the drug.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_Chemical_Desc: The active addictive ingredient in the drug. Different drugs that use the same chemical will be tied to the same tolerances and addictions.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_SafeDoseInterval_Desc: The period of time that needs to pass before it's safe enough (ie: no risk of addiction or overdose) to take another dose. Not all drugs have safe doses.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_CombatEnhancingDrug_Desc: Whether this is the kind of drug pawns will use to enhance their skills during combat.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_HighBenefitsRisks_Desc: The list of benefits/risks associated with the drug high, just from taking a dose.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_ToleranceForUsing_Desc: The tolerance level given each time the drug is used.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_SeverityUsesBodySize_Des: Whether the severity of the drug is affected by body size. For example, a small dog will get blackout drunk from beer much quicker than an elephant.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_MinToleranceToAddict_Des: The minimum tolerance level before addiction chances start.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_ToleranceDecay_Desc: The amount of tolerance removed each day.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_DosagesBeforeAddiction_D: The minimum number of consecutive doses before addiction chances start.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_ToleranceRisks_Desc: The list of risks associated with a drug tolerance, just from taking a dose without addiction or overdose.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_AddictionDecay_Desc: The amount of addiction severity removed each day.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_TimeToShakeAddiction_Des: The full period of time required to shake off an addiction, if no other doses are taken.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_AddictionRisks_Desc: The list of risks associated with addiction.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_OverdoseForUsing_Desc: The overdose level given each time the drug is used.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_OverdoseSeverityLevels_D: The overdose levels for a minor, major, and fatal overdose, respectively.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_OverdoseDecay_Desc: The amount of overdose severity removed each day.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_LargeOverdoseChance_Desc: The chance that a large overdose could happen, regardless of the current severity.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_DosagesBeforeOverdose_De: The minimum number of consecutive doses before overdoses can happen.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_OverdoseRisks_Desc: The list of risks associated with a drug overdose.
